backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor and all core CRM types including leads, customers, attendance, messaging, templates, and authorization-related records.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human‑written summaries for many frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and data‑loading patterns.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with root, CRM, and customer routes wrapped in a themed ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/AdminSection.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an admin UI section.
frontend/src/components/AgentPanelSectio: Implements agent management UI with filtering, stats, approval actions, and status badges.
frontend/src/components/AttendanceSectio: Handles attendance tracking with camera capture, geolocation, admin reporting, pagination, and skeleton loading.
frontend/src/components/CustomerAppLinkS: Displays a generated customer portal link with copy and open actions plus usage instructions.
frontend/src/components/CustomerQueriesS: Lists and manages customer queries for admins or agents, with creation and status update capabilities.
frontend/src/components/CustomersSection: Shows paginated customers and provides a dialog to add new customers with basic details.
frontend/src/components/DashboardLoadErr: Renders an error state card with retry controls and optional technical details for dashboard load failures.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Fetches and displays CRM overview metrics using cards with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with reload and reset options.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpsSection: Displays and manages customer follow-ups, including scheduling, listing, sorting, and marking tasks complete.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the top navigation with user info, theme toggle, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/LeadsSection.tsx: Handles lead listing, creation, status updates, assignment, and pagination filtering by status.
frontend/src/components/MessagingSection: Provides a messaging interface with conversations, message history, search, and sending messages.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to set up their profile with name, email, and role before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/TemplatesSection: UI for viewing, creating, copying, and setting default message templates by category using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/TicketsSection.t: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppLogsSect: Displays WhatsApp message logs, switching between admin and agent views, with sorting and lead name resolution.
Manages WhatsApp integration settings and allows manual message sending using templates and customer selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerAuth.ts: Handles customer auth via localStorage plus login, registration, logout, and profile queries with backend validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerQueries.ts: Provides hooks for submitting customer queries, fetching them by phone number, and retrieving a confirmation message.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity initialization logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useLoadTimeout.ts: Implements a timer hook that tracks whether a loading operation has exceeded a configurable timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data, including user profiles, admin checks, and overview metrics.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/csvUtils.ts: Generates and triggers download of an attendance report CSV built from backend data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ApprovalPendingPage.t: Empty page file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/CRMApp.tsx: Controls high-level app flow based on authentication and profile loading states, showing login, dashboard, or error screens as needed.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboard.tsx: Renders a customer-facing dashboard with profile info, query submission forms, theme toggling, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerLoginPage.tsx: Implements customer login and registration forms with validation and mutation hooks for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx: Determines whether to show the customer login page, dashboard, or loading/error states based on auth status.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the admin/agent dashboard with multiple tabbed sections and tracks visited tabs, with admin-only panels.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and user profile setup, validating and saving profile details when needed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, removing, and managing URL parameters including secret one-time parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, issues, and feature requests related to improving dashboard load performance.
